TopicTitle: Updates for xbox one and ps4

Articles.Content:
I don't have any were else to rant I want a refund lol or give us more versions of the game sell us the parts sell us the mods sell us the update I don't know how you release a game and it has so many dam bugs update the dam game all ready 

Edited March 6, 2017 by Kerbalmexican
They are working on a complete re-port with a new, more competent developer that is expected to be out in the next couple months.
But will this mean we have to repurchase the game?

3 hours ago, Shasaeb1987 said:

But will this mean we have to repurchase the game? 

No, you won't have to repurchase the game.

On 3/5/2017 at 11:46 PM, Kerbalmexican said:

I don't have any were else to rant I want a refund lol or give us more versions of the game sell us the parts sell us the mods sell us the update I don't know how you release a game and it has so many dam bugs update the dam game all ready 

You're talking to the wrong people if you want a refund, you have to contact xbox live support or playstation support. However both companies have no refund policies and will only refund your purchase if you've never played it or if it is completely unplayable.

On 3/13/2017 at 7:36 PM, SnowxSakura said:

You're talking to the wrong people if you want a refund, you have to contact xbox live support or playstation support. However both companies have no refund policies and will only refund your purchase if you've never played it or if it is completely unplayable.

Good luck I've already tried on the PS4, if you'd had this game for more than 30 days they won't give you a refund.
